category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMGCSItemType
preference.preference_description: Determines the Item type used when the Guided Component Search (GCS) functionality creates new Items. This is the case, for example, in the Classification application when a new classification object (ICO) is created in a class that has defined GCS connection point definitions (CPDs) defined or if a GCS CPD is added to a class that has ICOs without Items. A valid value is any valid Item types. The default value is "Item".
